description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
40765 - Support Open Office 3D Charts
41180 - Calculate weighted average on Subtotal row between two columns (Smart Markers)
41189 - Detect vertical or horizontal data source of a chart
 
Enhancements
41192 - Find and Replace inner texts
 
Performance
41162 - Workbook’s CalculateFormula method takes 30+ seconds
41150 - Performance degradation for Office 2007 as compared to 2003
40961 - CalculateFormula is taking around 3 minutes on 8 Core machine
41177 - Aspose Cell replacing Excel Wrapper
41142 - Saving an Excel document takes more than one minute
 
Exceptions
41157 - “Invalid formula” exception when opening an XLSX file
41166 - Aspose.Cells throws “ArgumentNullException” exception when opening a template file
41137 - Saving a MHtml file, reading in Aspose.Cells is a problem 
 
Bugs
41159 - Formula is not calculated properly
41158 - ActiveX Controls Corrupt a Workbook
41156 - 4 Spreadsheets are failed to be re-written
41165 - Excel Charts are Locked after Save
41160 - Error while copying Worksheets
41169 - Filled Radar Graph image rendered with hidden Axis Tick marks via Chart. ToImage method
41079 - Formatting data labels issue
41120 - Issue with calculating Excel chart
41179 - Issue with a column chart having both axis
41198 - Multiple calculated pivot fields result in unreadable file.
41151 - Custom XML Parts issue
41178 - This file is corrupted after being saved
41182 - Converting XLS to XLSX and back creates a bad XLS file
41191 - Converting XLS to XLSX creates a bad document
41181 - Rendering an MS Excel file to PDF document has an issue regarding contents
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
